testcase.classname: Pick Mistake without choose dropdown mistake type
testcase.name: Assign User to Contract DONA Bukalapak B2B
testcase.system-out: Given Go to IST.............................................................passed When Login IST with valid credentials.......................................passed Then Login Success for contract dispatcher..................................passed And Select Arrow Menu "Contract Dispatcher Admin"...........................passed And Select Menu "Management Assignment".....................................passed And Select Username "mobile.test" of Management Assignment..................passed And Check for username if already assigned to "Dona B2B"....................passed And Wait page for load......................................................passed And Click button "Logout"...................................................passed And Close browser...........................................................passed

testcase.classname: Pick Mistake without choose dropdown mistake type
testcase.name: Select Menu Contract Dispatcher and Select Contract based on type contract DONA Bukalapak B2B
testcase.system-out: Given Go to IST.............................................................passed When Login IST with valid credentials.......................................passed Then Login Success for contract dispatcher..................................passed And Select Menu "Contract Dispatcher".......................................passed And Select Contract Number based on Type Contract "DONA_BUKALAPAK_B2B"......passed And Click button "Claim"....................................................passed And Verify Tab Mistake Matrix Base on Type Contract.........................passed And Varify the mistake detail already match with the matrix Base on Type Contract.passed And Click on Tab "KTP"......................................................passed And Checkbox General Mistake "20. KTP atau Resi - Alamat tetap pemohon pada sistem (HoS) berbeda dengan KTP".passed And Click button "Save".....................................................passed And Get text from pop up "IT Supporting Tools" with text "Mistake Type cannot be empty".passed And Click button "OK".......................................................passed And Click button "Logout"...................................................passed And Comment "Register Mistake failed because Dropdown Mistake type didn't choose".passed And Close browser...........................................................passed
